ygData.subject: Song selections and Cha-Carillion
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yesterday, I changed from using Jonthan s, hymn, wince or sometimes Jonthan s, hymn, anthem, wince combination to using just chant, jonthan and hymn. I
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>
> Just curious, does Celerity stack with Anthem de Arms? If so, I'm interested
> in why one would choose Chant of Battle over Anthem. My current lineup at
> level 16 (DING! - I *love* the jig! It's so much more entertaining if while
> watching it, you sing to yourself - "Do a little dance, Make a little love,
> Get down tonight! Get down tonight!)

Yesterday, I changed from using Jonthan's, hymn, wince or
sometimes Jonthan's, hymn, anthem, wince combination to
using just chant, jonthan and hymn. I might be just hallucinating
but I thought I noticed a HUGE difference in my melee ability.
I guess the dex bonus from chant really pays off. The 5% from
stacking anthem isn't that great compared to it.

> Locating, Aquatic Ayre and Cindra's Charismatic Carillion (even though I
> haven't noticed it doing much good). When soloing I usually stack Jonthans,

And btw, the Carillion seems to increase _your_ faction with the
targeted person until you zone or re-log. Which means, any else
NPC with the same faction is also boosted. Hit carillion once and
all the npc's in one zone usually end up amiable if indifferent =)

> Songs that I've noticed don't seem to do much are the Rhythm songs and the
> Lucid Lullaby (Rats outside of Freeport were resisting it to me last night

Lullaby is resisted quite a bit yes.. It's pretty much only good if you
have a group that whacks a multible mob situation one by one, and
you just lullaby time after time and hope for best =)

> whether to get the song since it's another in the line of Rhythms. Is it me
> doing something wrong, or are these songs either very weak or completely
> useless?

They start to be useful when you start fighting casters. But at low levels,
if you fight a caster solo it will be a close call, and if you fight a caster
with group its usually a massacre =) Higher up, it will change that if you
fight a caster solo, it will be a massacre and if you fight it with a group
it can still be a close call ;)

- Ilkka Salmenkaita, isalmen@...
